The goal of eppasm is to ...

Forked from [eppasm](https://github.com/mrc-ide/eppasm) using [leapfrog](https://github.com/mrc-ide/leapfrog) as the underlying model.

## Installation

Install from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/eppasm-leapfrog")
```
